captions.text:
# Man, I'm gettin'
so sick and tired #
# Of fuckin' with this steel #

#They only give us 30 minutes
to eat lunch and chill #

<i># My body achin'</i>
<i>just to get a buck #

# I'm sick of eatin' this shit
off this fuckin' lunch truck #

<i># Nasty-ass food</i>
<i>I'm in a nasty-ass mood #

# I should have called in sick
Shit, I had somethin' to do ##

# I can't believe I'm hearin'
all this ravin' and rantin' #

# From Vanessa up here
at the New Detroit Stampin' #

<i># You need to get your food</i>
<i>and take your ass back to work #

#You're dreamin' if you think
them corny-ass raps will work #

# Rappin' away for food
off this raggedy lunch truck #

# I spit venom
in every direction
Soak some up #

# Look at this fat-ass nigga
Sloppy sucker #

# Stop rhymin'
Keep your day job, Vanessa #

# Next time, leave that bullshit
home on the dresser #

<i># Speaking of dresses</i>
<i>Take a look at Paul the fruitcake #

<i># When you travel you probably</i>
<i>pack panties in your suitcase #

<i># Made out oflace</i>
<i>from Victoria's Secret #

# If ten men came in a cup
you'd probably drink it ##
[Crowd Groaning, Laughing]

# Okay folks
Enough with the gay jokes #

# Especially from a gay broke
bitch yourself, eh, loc #

Who is this...
# His style is doo-doo #

#You've worked here
longer than me and I get
paid more than you do #

Serious, man.
# Dawg, take a seat #

#What's this guy
standin' in line for
He ain't got money to eat #

<i># Check this out</i>
<i>Yo, yo #

#This guy cashed his whole check
and bought one Ho-Ho #

[Laughing]
# Fuckin' homo, little maggot
You can't hack it #
# Paul's gay, you're a faggot #

#At least he admits it
Don't even risk it #

- #This guy's starvin' to death
Someone get him a biscuit #
- [Laughing]

# I don't know what
they told you, Mike #

#You must have had them
cornrows rolled too tight #

#This job, you wanna quit
But you can't #

#You've worked at this plant
so long, you're a plant #

# Look at your goddamn boots
For Christ sakes #

- #They're startin' to grow roots #
- [Laughing]
# On this mike you get faded #

- #You look like a pissed-off rapper
who never made it #
- [Crowd] Ooh!

# Hey, why you fuckin'
with the gay guy, "G" #

#When really you're the one
who's got the H.I.V. #

[Crowd] Ooh!
# Man, I'm done with this clown
He's soft #

# Fuck it, I'll let homegirl
finish you off ##
[Yelling]

<i># That's the only way you comin'#</i>
Hey, lookin' for your brother?

Do you want to
do somethin' tonight?

Are you askin' me out
on a date, Jimmy Smith, Jr?

Yeah, as a matter
of fact, I am.

Why don't you
take me somewhere now?

comments.text:
There was once a boy who was 3 years old,
Had a mind of creativity and a heart of gold,
Always so generous and never so cold,
Such a sweet nice boy is what his parents were told,
Never realizin' they had a sick boy in hold,
Until the doctor, told'em about it,
An the mother and the father knew they couldn't even dout it,
So they fell in shock, trapped in fear,
Of their son havin' kidney cancer could have his end near,
But no, the dad stood strong,
And mama full of hope,
Hopin nothin could ever go wrong, so was he alone in this?
No he was not, 
He the doctors and his parents tied up in a knot,
Tryn'a help him get through this tough postion spot,
Motivating him to pick up his strength and give it a shot,
So during the surgery he opened his eyes,
Not even realizin' he was lifting to the sky, 
To a man in a white robe reachin' for his little hand,
As the boy question himself "who is this man?",
Until all of a sudden everythin went black,
And he woke up in a white room knowin he was back,
And the reason i know this, 
It is because i was the kid in the story and that is that.﻿

comments.author: Nick K.

comments.text:
Aright im late as fuck, but to the kid who said im retarded like the rap I 
wrote. Think clear little bitch, that shit was actually true, and I bet you 
wouldnt be sayin that if you went through it too. Im not gonna even worry 
about your fagget ass JB lookin ass, but I found it offensive responding 
like that to a cancer survivor. N to the other puto who thinks (if it was 
towards me) that Im whining on the comment section about my life, just 
stfu. I can post watever tf I want, n i thought I should share this off to 
the ones who would like to relate or inspire from it. if you dont wanna 
read it, than dont. Not so hard at all. N just to point out, I dont find 
this as someone hating, just disrespect to my to the disease I actually 
went through, if you were to give negative energy to how it was written or 
watever, than alright, im not gonna give a fuck. But if it is something 
about this, i will give a fuck. Also, to point out another thing, Im gonna 
laugh at this if i ever look at it again in the future. Becuz in two years 
from now after highschool, Im gonna get my studio set and get my to the top 
as one of the greatest rappers, n i mean better than these generation of 
"rappers". I got alot more raps better than this one, but im gonna save 
them when im set. Soo the haters to me are welcome, but to the 
disrespectful bitches gtfo witcho shit disrespecting a cancer survivor or a 
person with other types of sicknesses. O.T out..
comments.author: omar eduardo

comments.text:
nice story man i definately enjoy seeing creativity on these comment pages, 
anyway u inspired me to share a little something about myself, im a 
recoverying drug addict who wrote this through thoughts of suicide and 
moments of fleeting hope so i complement you and share.... dear lord, been 
ignorin ur will, been tryin to barter, been feelin my heart growin harder, 
wise up get smarter for starters, pray everyday, i know u wanna grave but 
do u wanna be a slave, lucifers smashin bottles of tangeray on ur face, is 
that really the place u wanna pace night  after night screamin for gods 
graces, feel  the shackles and hear the demon cackles as ur gettin tackled, 
its not to late ur in charge of ur fate, concentrate. give me strenghth for 
life, fuck spite spite, fuck sbabbin myself with a knife outta fright, last 
thoughtl be remorse, even worse youll put a curse on your family with a 
hearst ina chuch and ur body 6 feet under in the dirt. fuck this distain , 
get contained, and maintain, deal with some pain, so what if life feels 
kinda plain. grabe your good wolf and feed him, and god hack my brain and 
download the garden of eden. I'm ready to die but i can't deny or lie, so 
i'll just transcribe my vibe, im tryin to stay alive and loved ones are 
why, motivation drives, but sometimes i, feel i can't survive, when all i 
do to myself is critisize,and try to revize, what lies in store for me from 
god himself, i just throw his will on the shelf........... theres more but 
im lazy love u em

comments.author: Greg Bacher

comments.text:
+R619ification2011 That is quite respectful of you. I appreciate the fact 
that you did not respond by calling me names or attempting to 'outwit' me 
(though I have a feeling you could probably do so, as im not the smartest 
person on youtube). 

Thank you and goodbye.
comments.author: Theodore Alldis

comments.text:
You know what? I'm done with this conversation. It's not doing either of us 
any good. It'd be a shame to argue over such petty a matter. Good day
comments.author: R619ification2011

comments.text:
+R619ification2011 +R619ification2011 Honour... okay.... So you are saying 
that.... by stating that that that is a popular American catchphrase, that 
instantly makes the statement 'I am better than you?'. That is like saying 
that me pointing out someone is of a certain race or skin tone and then you 
telling me that pointing it out makes me racist. I don't get it. Call me 
stupid and whatnot, I will let you do that. 

Either way, all I was saying was I find his use of the word fa*ot offensive 
and unneeded. Its not like you can't insult someone without calling them a 
derogatory word, so is it needed? I am not trying to offend anybody, just 
stating my opinion. Sorry if you find me stating my opinion to be an 
invitation to attack me.
comments.author: Theodore Alldis

comments.text:
I'm not attempting to put you down. Just stopping you from doing the same 
to me. You say you don't feel superior but the way in which you casually 
refer to my "American" sayings implies you feel "above" it. I'm not here to 
fight but I will not have my honour insulted
comments.author: R619ification2011

comments.text:
+R619ification2011 Did I say, im better than you? Does it make you feel 
powerful to argue with me? You can give your opinion all you want, I will 
stop arguing, but no need to try to put me down to make yourself the winner 
of the debate you seem to think this is.
comments.author: Theodore Alldis

comments.text:
So you have the right to state your opinion but nobody else can. My place 
of origin has nothing to do with this - do you feel superior due to your 
different nationality? Now who's being the asshole?
comments.author: R619ification2011

comments.text:
+R619ification2011 Im sorry, what? Have you ever met me? I honestly do not 
care about your favorite American catchphrase 'it's a free country'. Does 
that give you the right to be an asshole? Do you always feel the need to 
put people down? I just said I would like it more if he didn't use 
homophobic, but did I invite you to come and laugh at me. Were you thinking 
'hey im going to put down the sensitive gay guy today, that's how I spend 
my time!' Honestly, that's what it feels like. If you don't agree, there 
isn't a need for you to put your two cents in.
comments.author: Theodore Alldis

comments.text:
+Theodore Alldis Just because you find something offensive, doesn't mean he 
doesn't have the right to say it - it's a free country. And you don't like 
this movie because of his alleged views on homosexuals? No offense but what 
kind of stupid are you?
comments.author: R619ification2011
